TopicTitle: View from Command Pod or From Kerbal eyes?

Articles.Content: Is this possible i checked the input mapping and the changelog but I didnt catched anything, I\'ve seen some people talking about this and i know some part of IVA\'s are done.
I red that IVA weren\'t done when version 0.16 came out,maybe there will be in future versions

I thought this too, but [i think] it turns out that in this version the newly modeled cockpits are only view-able from the \'kerbal-cam\' in the bottom left of the screen... But yeah I thought that 0.16 would have an entirely visual 3D cockpit, only we couldn\'t do anything in it, but it turns out we cant

Cheers,

Dom

Dom\'s right; the 'Internal space' the changelog shows is talking about the newly-modelled interior space, which is currently only complete enough to be viewed through the cockpit cams. They\'ll wait until we\'re able to control the craft from the internal space before introducing complete IVA, according to what I\'ve heard from the Devs.
